titles: By the mayor, to the alderman of the ward of [blank] whereas I have received a rule made yesterday by His Majesties Court of Kings-Bench, whereby (upon great complaint made to the said court, that squibs and crackers are frequently thrown into coaches passing the streets of this city ...)
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Tulse, Henry, Sir, d. 1689.
publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, Printer to this Honourable City,
notes: Reproduction of original in Guildhall Library (London, England).
keywords: Offenses against public safety --  England --  London.
